headlines.description: Liverpool moved to the top of the Premier League on Saturday, thumping Watford 5-0 in Claudio Ranieri's first match in charge of the Hornets.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mane, Firmino, Salah star as Liverpool go top

headlines.description: Wolves came from two down to win 3-2 at Aston Villa on Saturday with all five goals coming in the second half of a thrilling Midlands derby.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves stun Aston Villa with late comeback win

headlines.description: Manchester United's unbeaten run away from home in the Premier League ended after they slumped to a 4-2 defeat at Leicester City on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd unbeaten away run ends at Leicester

headlines.description: — Bernardo Silva and Kevin De Bruyne scored as Manchester City claimed a hard-fought 2-0 win over Burnley in the English Premier League on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Silva, De Bruyne score for City in 2-0 EPL win over Burnley

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Norwich City

headlines.description: — Norwich’s wait for a first English Premier League win of the season goes on after a scoreless draw with Brighton on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Norwich still waiting for first EPL win after home draw

headlines.description: Southampton claimed their first Premier League victory of the season as Armando Broja's second-half goal gave them a 1-0 win at home to Leeds United
headlines.shortLinkText: Broja gives Saints first win as Leeds fall

headlines.description: Chelsea returned to the top of the Premier League after a nervy 1-0 victory at Brentford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chilwell stunner seals Chelsea win at Brentford
